title: Could I please get my silver border in normal games?
body: Hello rito, in ranked matches I have the silver border shown for the silver rank I reached last year, but in normal blind and draft games it doesn't show the silver border and so I was wondering if I could have the silver border plz? I wasn't going to care about putting in a request but it was bugging me and it took me 4 years to get out of bronze to get to silver so I want what little I have earned. Thanks for listening to my request, and best of luck with keeping this game alive =)

replies.body: Thanks for the info, its nice to know its being fixed at some point =)
